text.text:
<https://TIOF.Click/TUPresentation|TechUp> is a collaborative space uniting capacity building and social participation to build better and safer technology by enabling the tech community to become the agents of change that digital societies need right now. 

>*Programmers are the next generation of Human and Digital Rights defenders.*
<https://TheIOFoundation.org|The IO Foundation> is always looking for _Tech Communities_, _Speakers_, _FOSS projects_ and _supporting organizations_. Come make your impact!

ðŸ”¸ Are you a member of a tech community? 
 More info: <https://TIOF.Click/TUGuideCommunities|TechUp Community Partners' Guide>.

ðŸ”¸ Do you want to share your knowledge with our community? 
 More info: <https://TIOF.Click/TUGuideSpeaker|TechUp Speakers' Guide>.

ðŸ”¸ Seeking support for your FOSS project? 
 More info: <https://TIOF.Click/TUGuideProject|TechUp FOSS Projects' Guide>.

ðŸ”¸ Do you provide some type of support to FOSS projects or Civil Society? 
 More info: <https://TIOF.Click/TUGuideOrg|TechUp Organization Partners' Guide>.

elements.text: :pushpin: Do you have any questions? *Leave a comment on the thread or contact us: @JFQueralt>*.
